body.p: The agent settings are based on a classic key/value mechanism.

It reads its settings differently depending on the operating system:
Windows: with the registry keys located at KEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/SOFTWARE/FusionInventory-Agent
MacOSX: the configuration file is located in FusionInventory-Agent.pkg/Contents/Resources/agent.cfg
UNIX/Linux: on UNIX/Linux, the agent expect its configuration to be here /etc/fusioninventory/agent.cfg
prebuilt: if you use a prebuilt package, the agent.cfg configuration is in the root directory of the package.
